short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: So you can read on a website and at the same time watch videos on a second screen without switching back and forth.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension creates a new second screen on your browser and hides any YouTube ads, so you can watch YouTube Videos and read on a website at the same time without switching back and forth.


For example if you like to watch Video-Series, keynotes, tutorials, etc. and at the same time like read or surf on other websites but don't want to miss when something important happens in the video. This extension allows you to keep an eye on your favorite videos.
